outputSpeech.ssml: <speak>You can ask Wine Assistant for wine information. Say, Find a wine by its winery and name.</speak>

card.title: Wine Assistant, your Sommelier
card.content: You can ask Wine Assistant for wine information. Say, Find a wine by its winery and name.

outputSpeech.ssml: <speak>You can ask me about a wine, then get details about the wine. What are you interested in?</speak>
